show.description: Whether the children should be shown or hidden.
show.description_zh: 是应该显示还是隐藏子项。

as.description: The element or component to render in place of the Transition itself.
as.description_zh: 要渲染的元素或组件，以代替 Transition 本身。

appear.description: Whether the transition should run on initial mount.
appear.description_zh: 转换是否应在初始挂载时运行。

unmount.description: Whether the element should be unmounted or hidden based on the show state.
unmount.description_zh: 应根据 show 状态卸载还是隐藏元素。

enter.description: Classes to add to the transitioning element during the entire enter phase.
enter.description_zh: 在整个 enter 阶段添加到 transitioning 元素的类。

enterFrom.description: Classes to add to the transitioning element before the enter phase starts.
enterFrom.description_zh: 在 enter 阶段开始之前要添加到 transitioning 元素的类。

enterTo.description:
Classes to add to the transitioning element immediately after the enter
phase starts.
enterTo.description_zh:
在 enter 后立即添加到 transitioning 元素的类
阶段开始。

entered.description:
Classes to add to the transitioning element once the transition is done.
These classes will persist after that, until it's time to leave.
entered.description_zh:
过渡完成后要添加到 transitioning 元素的类。
这些类将在那之后持续存在，直到该离开了。

leave.description: Classes to add to the transitioning element during the entire leave phase.
leave.description_zh: 在整个离开阶段添加到过渡元素的类。

leaveFrom.description: Classes to add to the transitioning element before the leave phase starts.
leaveFrom.description_zh: 在离开阶段开始之前要添加到过渡元素的类。

leaveTo.description:
Classes to add to the transitioning element immediately after the leave
phase starts.
leaveTo.description_zh:
在离开后立即添加到过渡元素的类
阶段开始。

beforeEnter.description: Callback which is called before we start the enter transition.
beforeEnter.description_zh: Callback 的回调，该回调在我们开始 enter transition 之前调用。

afterEnter.description: Callback which is called after we finished the enter transition.
afterEnter.description_zh: Callback 回调，在我们完成 enter 过渡后调用。

beforeLeave.description: Callback which is called before we start the leave transition.
beforeLeave.description_zh: Callback 回调，在我们开始离开过渡之前调用。

afterLeave.description: Callback which is called after we finished the leave transition.
afterLeave.description_zh: Callback 回调，在我们完成离开过渡后调用。
